reviewText: From Macedonia comes this brilliant apocalyptic fantasy spanning three eras: a post-World War III wasteland where a blasphemer is condemned to eternal life, a 1900 street scene photographed by the nascent movie cameras which finds the first wedding and the first murder captured on film, and New Year's Eve 1999 with a solemn wake disrupted by a psychotic Santa Claus.  Macedonia's entry for the 1998 Best Foreign Language Film Oscar, this is a powerfully jolting work of art and fun.
